thread.title: craig schwartz

author: craig schwartz
title: craig schwartz
text: Lais was amazing! She was knowledgeable, interesting and a lot of fun. She customized our 3 day tour to include not only the usual sites but easily added Jewish heritage areas, the Hippy craft market and much more. Despite three people with food allergies & four of us vegetarians, meals were easy and delicious. We highly recommend Lais as the best guide we have ever had.
